description.en-US: Golden Teacher is one of the most popular cubensis varieties, known for its balanced effects and reliable growth.

growingConditions.en-US: Beginner-friendly; grows well indoors in warm, humid environments using standard substrates like brown rice flour or manure.

sizeAppearance.en-US: Medium-sized with golden-yellow caps, up to 8 cm wide, and slender pale stems.
